## Cell cycling analysis

We scored cell cycle phases using `s.features` and `g2m.features` shown below.

| Phase | Related genes |
| :---: | :------------: |
| S | `r s.features` |
| G2M | `r g2m.features` |

The figures display the scores of S phase and G2M phase.
